message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%. We can always negotiate later if you're unhappy.
You took a big chunk last round, I'm offering a smaller share this time. Consider this a compromise.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a larger share than what you offered. 6000 for me and 4000 for you seems fair considering the inflation.
I'm willing to split it down the middle, but I'm not sure if you'll be happy with this. It's a fair offer, but I'm not getting any younger.
